name: atlas-xray-extension
description: Bare bones Chrome extension using React, IndexedDB, and Sass.

scripts.build:icons: magick src/assets/icon.svg -resize 16x16 src/assets/icons/icon-16.png && magick src/assets/icon.svg -resize 48x48 src/assets/icons/icon-48.png && magick src/assets/icon.svg -resize 128x128 src/assets/icons/icon-128.png
scripts.build:manifest: mkdir -p dist/icons && node scripts/buildManifest.js && cp src/assets/icons/*.png dist/icons/
scripts.build:css: npx sass src/components/ChromeExtension/ChromeExtensionPopup.scss dist/popup.css --source-map && npx sass src/styles/main.scss dist/main.css --source-map && npx sass src/components/FloatingButton/FloatingButton.scss dist/floatingButton.css --source-map
scripts.build:html:
echo 'Atlas Xray
' > dist/popup.html
scripts.build:merge-css: touch dist/contentScript.css && cat dist/main.css >> dist/contentScript.css && cat dist/floatingButton.css >> dist/contentScript.css && rm dist/main.css dist/main.css.map dist/floatingButton.css dist/floatingButton.css.map
scripts.build: npm run --silent build:js && npm run --silent build:css && npm run --silent build:html && npm run --silent build:chromeExtension && npm run --silent build:background && npm run --silent build:manifest && npm run --silent build:merge-css
scripts.build:check: npm run check:versions && npm run build
scripts.build:test: npm run test:silent && npm run build
